stage.description: The stage in the signal chain where the pattern is injected. Options are: 'jesd' (output of ADCs), 'channel' (output of channelizer), or 'beamf' (output of tile beamformer).

polarisation.description: The polarisation to apply the ramp for. This must be 0, 1 or -1 to use all stages.

ramp.description: The ramp to use. Options are 'ramp1', 'ramp2' or 'all' to use all ramps. (note: ramp2 = ramp1 + 1234)
